name: Shrek's Airteleporting Adventure
description:
In this epic game Shrek has learned a new ability called Airteleporting. Using this ability, Shrek is able to glitch through platforms and take massive shortcuts in his adventure. But he doesn't like Airteleporting. That's why he's trying to beat his worst enemy in this epic platformer in order to be able to jump again.

Controls:

AD = Left & Right

Space = Airteleport

CTRL = Restart level

Left Mouse Click = Shoot bullets

Software used:

- Game Maker Studio 2

- GIMP

Developer Note:

This is just some short Shrek fangame with a lot of bugs. At the beginning Airteleporting was just a glitch but I noticed that it was a lot more fun than casual jumping.

Enjoy the game!
